data.description: 01 October 2024: Ambulances were attacked by Israeli forces who opened fire at them.
01 October 2024: Ambulances were unable to reach the area and evacuate injured Palestinians for several hours due to being fired at by Israeli quadcopters amid the ongoing Israeli incursion.

01 October 2024: Red Cross health workers were handcuffed, had their IDs confiscated, used as human shields, and denied access to a wounded Palestinian who was arrested upon the health workers' release.
01 October 2024: In Balata Refugee Camp, at least 3,500 pupils and over 50 UNRWA staff members were trapped for two hours inside their schools, clinics, and offices during an Israeli forces raid.
01 October 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was fired at by Israeli forces live ammunition, damaging it and injuring a crew member. They were then evacuated.
01 October 2024: Two doctors, a UN-agency teacher and three children were killed when Israeli airstrikes hit their family home during the night, killing a total of 23 family members
01 October 2024: In Balata Refugee Camp, six PRCS paramedics were injured when undercover Israeli forces fired live ammunition at their ambulance, damaging it.

01 October 2024: A Red Cross ambulance crew was prevented from evacuating the injured in the camp, including six Red Cross health workers who had been fired at. They were then directly fired at, damaging the body and windshield of the ambulance.
01 October 2024: In Balata Refugee Camp, a PRCS ambulance was fired at for a second time by Israeli forces live ammunition, injuring two crew members while transporting a wounded individual.
October 2024: A health worker and a humanitarian worker were detained by Israeli forces. They were released in February 2025 during a prisoner exchange, following inhumane treatment.
02 October 2024: The vicinity of a clinic was hit by Israeli airstrikes.
02 October 2024: Three Palestinian paramedics were severely beaten by Israeli forces.
05 October 2024: A Palestinian was killed in a camp by an Israeli landmine in the vicinity of a medical facility.
05 October 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, the vicinity of a clinic was hit by Israeli airstrikes, killing at least two Palestinians and injuring an unspecified number of others.
05 October 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility inside a camp, was hit by an Israeli aristrike killing and injuring an unspecified number of people.
06 October 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by suspected Israeli strikes.
06 October 2024: Red Cross staff were forced to evacuate their homes, resulting in the suspension of medical services at four of their clinics.
06 October 2024: A Red Cross medical facility was issued an evacuation order by Israeli forces, resulting in the suspension of its services.
07 October 2024: A medical facility’s courtyard and gate was engulfed with smoke bombs fired by Israeli forces.
07 October 2024: Tents sheltering displaced people at a medical facility were hit by Israeli airstrikes, killing 11 people and injuring an unspecified number of other, including a journalist.

07 October 2024: The road leading to a medical facility entrance was destroyed, blocking access to the medical facility morgue, medical supply storage, and fuel warehouses. Ambulances were also obstructed.
07 October 2024: A medical facility was besieged by Israeli forces after storming the city with multiple vehicles.
07 October 2024: A Red Cross medical facility was issued an evacuation order by Israeli forces and threatened with raid and destruction. The facility was evacuated and put out of service.
08 October 2024: A medical facility was ordered to evacuate by Israeli forces who threatened the facility with destruction, killing and arrest if the order was not followed.
08 October 2024: A paramedic was arrested by Israeli forces while transferring an intensive care patient during forced evacuation from medical facility.
08 October 2024: An INGO ambulance driver was injured on his legs and chest by shrapnel. He died from his injuries two days later.

08 October 2024: An NGO medical facility was ordered to evacuate by Israeli forces who threatened the facility with destruction, killing and arrest if the order was not followed. However, the medical facility's acting director reported that he would remain with 15 staff members to keep treating patients.
08 October 2024: A UN-agency were unable to reach a medical facility to evacuate patients, likely due to Israeli restrictions.

08 October 2024: A medical facility was ordered to evacuate by Israeli forces who threatened the facility with destruction, killing and arrest if the order was not followed. The following day, the medical facility was put out of service.

08 October 2024: A medical facility was besieged by Israeli forces who opened fire on its administration office. The medical facility is expected to shut down due to fuel shortages. The next day, the medical facility was put out of service following its forced evacuation.
08 October 2024: Red Cross were refused participation in the evacuation of a medical facility.

09 October 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, at least 17 Palestinians were killed and an unspecified number of others injured when tents belonging to displaced people inside a medical facility were hit by Israeli airstrikes and subsequently caught fire.
09 October 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, civil defense teams were shot at by Israeli forces while extinguishing a fire in a medical facility following an earlier Israeli airstrike.

09 October 2024: An obstetrician-gynaecologist, who ran her own clinic before she was displaced, was killed in a taxi during Israeli airstrikes. Her husband, a former university dean, was confirmed as killed on 17 March.

09 October 2024: A UN-agency were unable to reach a forcefully evacuated medical facility for the second time despite receiving a green light from the Israeli authorities. After hours at a checkpoint, the mission had to be aborted.
09 October 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, a house behind the Civil Defense headquarters was hit by Israeli forces, killing six people and injuring an unspecified number of others.
09 October 2024: The vicinity of a UN clinic, inside a camp, was hit by Israeli airstrikes.
09 October 2024: Medical crews were fired at with an Israeli artillery shell while evacuating a medical facility.
09 October 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli artillery shelling.
10 October 2024: Fuel supplies have been prevented from reaching medical facilitys by Israeli forces, putting medical institutions in danger of closing within the next 24 hours.

10 October 2024: A WHO and a UN mine agency convoy of seven ambulances and three UN vehicles were denied for a third time to reach a forcefully evacuated medical facility and waited five hours in a holding point due to intense fighting ahead. Alternative route suggestions made by UN staff were rejected. The planned mission to evacuate two international emergency medical staff and 13 patients was aborted.
10 October 2024: PRCS ambulances were prevented for the third time from reaching a medical facility to evacuate patients following Israeli forces order.
10 October 2024: In a temporary shelter, six Palestinians were killed and fifteen others were injured in an Israeli forces attack targeting a medical facility which shelters displaced people.

10 October 2024: In al Far’a Refugee Camp, a Red Crescent ambulance point was forcibly closed and teams evacuated after Israeli forces fired live bullets at the crew during a raid. Soldiers fired bullets at the head and feet of one health worker as a warning.

10 October 2024: An off duty Red Cross ambulance was searched at a checkpoint, a paramedic detained, and the crew beaten and partially stripped by Israeli forces, following the forced closure of their medical facility in a camp.
10 October 2024: A Red Cross crew were held at gunpoint by Israeli forces while they demanded they bring the victims body and gun to them.
10 October 2024: A medical facility was damaged by Israeli drones.
10 October 2023: A physiotherapist was killed with her family after being hit by Israeli forces, likely with explosives.
11 October 2024: The vicinity of a UN clinic, inside a camp, was hit by Israeli airstrikes.
11 October 2024: A medical facility was at risk of closure due to lack of fuel. The facility received fuel the next day.
12 October 2024: All ambulances were forced to cease operations due to fuel shortages caused by Israeli forces blockades.
12 October 2024: In Nuseirat Refugee Camp, an NGO-supported medical facility was fired at by an Israeli quadcoptor.

12-13 October 2024: An unspecified number of paramedics were arrested during the forced evacuation of patients from a medical facility by Israeli forces. One paramedic was stripped and interrogated for an hour before his release
12 October 2024: The road behind a Red Cross medical facility was bombed by Israeli forces.

13 October 2024: In a camp, at least 22 civilians were killed, including 15 children, and 80 others injured in an Israeli airstrike on an UN-agency school sheltering displaced people. The facility had been intended for use as a polio vaccination site the following day but the programme was suspended due to damage.
13 October 2024: The vicinity of a medical centre was hit by an Israeli airstrike.
14 October 2024: An ambulance was hit by Israeli airstrikes.

14 October 2024: In Nuseirat Refugee Camp, a medical facility courtyard was hit and IDP tents were burned by an Israeli airstrike. At least four people were burnt to death, including a student connected to an IV drip, and at least 40 injured, including women and children.
14 October 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, the gates of a medical facility were hit by Israeli airstrikes, killing and injuring an unspecified number of people.
14 October 2024: In Jenin Refugee Camp, a Palestinian paramedic was arrested during an Israeli raid.
14 October 2024: The civil defense teams were hit by Israeli forces artillery while they recovered casualties from a previous airstrike.
15 October 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, a male paramedic was shot and killed by Israeli forces while attempting to evacuate injured family members trapped in the aftermath of an Israeli airstrike.
15 October 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by an Israeli airstrike.
15 October 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was struck by Israel drones.
17 October 2024: In Al-Maghazi Refugee Camp, the director of an ambulance department was killed alongside his family in his home by Israeli bombing.
17 October 2024: In a camp, a Palestinian youth was shot and injured by Israeli forces. Medical teams were also prevented from approaching him.
17 October 2024: The vicinity of a Red Cross medical facility was hit by Israeli artillery shelling.
17 October 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli airstrikes.
18 October 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, an NGO medical facility was hit by an Israeli strike.
18 October 2024: A medical facility became inoperable when its top floors and front yard, hosting trauma and chronic patients and medical staff, were hit by Israeli forces.
18 October 2024: An ambulance was attacked by a group of Israeli settlers while transporting a patient. The doctor and ambulance driver were beaten.
18-21 October 2024: An urgent request by UNRWA to evacuate Palestinians trapped under rubble was denied by Israeli forces.
19 October 2024: Two intensive care patients died in medical facility due to the ongoing siege, shortages of necessary medical supplies and total power outage.
19 October 2024: An ambulance belonging to an NGO-supported medical facility was reportedly struck, injuring six people including a paramedic.
19 October 2024: A medical facility was struck by an Israeli airstrike, damaging its electricity grid.
19 October 2024: A medical facility was besieged by Israeli tanks. with at least 40 patients and 15 health workers trapped inside.
19 October 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, a nurse was killed with his family members by an Israeli airstrike on a residential building.
19 October 2024: The entrance of a medical facility where the laboratory was located was hit by Israel airstrikes and drones, killing two Palestinians and injuring others.
19 October 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, an unspecified number of people were injured while sheltering inside a medical facility by Israeli forces quadcoptors.
19 October 2024: The upper floors of an NGO-supported medical facility were struck by Israeli bombing, injuring an unspecified number of health workers.

As reported on 19 October 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, a medical facility used to shelter displaced people was besieged by Israeli forces. Ambulances could not access the injured within the facility and the wounded were unable to leave. As a result, the medical facility suspended its medical services.

19 October 2024: Six medical NGOs were barred from operating in the enclave, where the healthcare system had collapsed and only 17 out of 36 medical facilitys were still operational. On 30 October, the ban was lifted for at least one of the NGO's.

19 October 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was stopped by Israeli forces who confiscated the crew’s phones and communication devices. A paramedic was detained, while the driver was held at gunpoint, for around 20 minutes.
Between 13-26 October 2024: A medical facility's stabilisation centre closed and outpatient programme disrupted due to the Israeli siege on the facility for at least seven weeks.

20 October 2024: The transport of medical supplies, including blood and anaesthesia, food parcels, and fuel to a medical facility was denied. The next day, the medical facility director reported that blood units were exhausted, medical crews were working without food, and a number of patients consequently died of their wounds.
20 October 2024: A school sheltering displaced civilians was torched by Israeli forces. Flames spread to a nearby medical facility’s generators.

20 October 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, a UN school sheltering displaced civilians was bombed by Israeli forces, killing and injuring an unspecified number of people. Civil defence teams were prevented from reaching them.

20 October 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was obstructed at a checkpoint by IDF, despite coordination with Red Cross, which the soldiers denied. After being searched by civil administration, and another call to Red Cross, the ambulance was granted entry.
21 October 2024: UNRWA medical points were no longer operational due to lack of vital medical supplies.

21 October 2024: An NGO-supported medical facility was besieged by Israeli forces, reportedly trapping 151 people, including children and health workers, inside. External support and patients could not reach the medical facility. The facility ran out of medical supplies and food, including clean water, the next day.
21 October 2024: A patient was detained and interrogated and a companion arrested by Israeli forces at a checkpoint during a coordinated  Red Cross evacuation.
21 October 2024: Four people were killed in a camp by an Israeli drone attack near a medical facility.
22 October 2024: A medical facility was hit by Israeli forces artillery shelling, killing and injuring an unspecified number of people.
As reported on 22 October 2024: Communication challenges caused by internet outages hampered efforts to ascertain conditions at a medical facility.
22 October 2024: A medical facility yard was hit with Israeli sound bombs, killing one woman and injured six civilians.
As reported on 22 October 2024: Jabalia Refugee Camp, communication challenges caused by internet outages hampered efforts to ascertain conditions at an NGO medical facility.
22 October 2024: Patients and their families were demanded to evacuate the vicinity of a medical facility by Israeli forces.
As reported on 22 October 2024: Roads leading to a medical facility were destroyed by Israeli bombing. Patients and ambulance crews could not reach the facility.
As reported on 23 October 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, ambulances and patients were unable to access an NGO-supported medical facility due to Israeli forces stationed nearby.
As reported on 23 October 2024: An Israeli military base and interrogation centre was set up directly next to an inoperable medical facility.
23 October 2024: A male nurse was killed by an Israeli forces drone strike.
23 October 2024: Two health workers were killed by an Israeli forces drone strike while treating the wounded near a medical facility.
23 October 2024: Ambulance and civil defence workers were ordered to leave their vehicles, halt operations and go to a checkpoint near a medical facility set up by Israeli forces.
23 October 2024: The Civil Defense suspended all services after Israeli forces detained five of their workers and destroyed their only fire truck.
23 October 2024: A medical facility was struck by Israeli airstrikes.
23 October 2024: A Red Cross mobile medical facility was damaged when a group of Israeli settlers launched rocks at it while leaving a mission.
23 October 2024: Two Palestinians in a camp were killed when the vicinity of a medical facility was hit by an Israeli drone strike.
23 October 2024: Displaced families were forced to evacuate a medical facility that sheltered displaced people by Israeli forces.
23 October 2024: A medical facility was besieged by Israeli forces who closed off roads to the facility.
23 October 2024: An unspecified number of medical staff were arrested by Israeli forces outside of a medical facility.
24-25 October 2024: The upper floors of a medical facility, including a paediatrics unit, were damaged by Israeli forces tanks, injuring an unspecified number of staff.
24 October 2024: A medical facility was struck by Israeli drone open fire.
23 October 2024: The WHO suspended the second polio dose vaccination campaign (third phase) due to the intensifying Israeli siege on the area. It was rescheduled to start on 02 November.
24 October 2024: The pharmacy and warehouse an NGO-supported medical facility were struck by Israeli shelling.
24 October 2024: An unspecified number of health workers were injured when an Israeli artillery shell fell near a bus carrying Ministry of Health employees.
24 October 2024: The vicinity of an NGO-ran rehabilitation and specialised surgery medical facility was hit by Israeli forces shelling.

24 October 2024: In Nuseirat Refugee Camp, a school housing displaced families was hit by an Israeli airstrike for reportedly being a Hamas “command and control complex”, killing at least 17 Palestinians, including nine children, of which one was a baby, and a male dean of nursing. At least 32 more were injured.
As reported on 24 October 2024: The boundary wall of a medical facility was demolished by suspected Israeli forces.
24 October 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was shot by Israeli forces, injuring a health worker.
24 October 2024: An INGO health worker was killed alongside four family members after an Israeli airstrike struck the building he was staying in.
24 October 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was stopped at a checkpoint and the crew cursed at by Israeli soldiers.
25 October 2024: A medical facility was bombed by Israeli tanks, killing two children in ICU and injuring an unspecified number of patients, including children.
25 October 2024: Patients were prevented from evacuating and medical aid was blocked from entering a besieged medical facility by Israeli forces.
25 October 2024: WHO reportedly lost contact with staff inside a medical facility following the raid on the facility by Israeli forces.

25 October 2024: A medical facility was raided by Israeli forces who opened fire inside. Three nurses and a cleaner were injured. Patients and staff were held without food or water and an all men, including 44 medical staff, were detained after being stripped; an INGO nursing director and INGO surgeon were among them.The medical facility director and 13 other staff were later released. The medical facility perimeter, three ambulances, a transport vehicle, medical supplies and its solar electric system were destroyed. When IDF withdrew the next day, only one paediatrician remained in the facility.
25 October 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, a UN clinic was stormed by Israeli forces, forcing displaced Palestinians to evacuate.
25 October 2024: A doctor was killed by Israeli forces.
25 October 2024: The relative of a health worker was shot and killed inside a medical facility by an Israeli drone
As reported on 26 October 2024: A WHO-led mission to deliver food, water and medical supplies was denied by the Israeli authorities.
Around 26 October 2024: A doctor was arrested from a medical facility located inside a refugee camp by Israeli forces. After 10 days in captivity, he was released and immediately shot dead.
As reported on 27 October 2024: A pharmacy outside a medical facility was destroyed during an Israeli military incursion into the area.
28 October 2024: In Askar Refugee Camp, an unspecified number of ambulance vehicles were obstructed by Israeli forces.

31 October 2024: Three Palestinians were killed during an Israeli raid in a camp. The raid involved a drone strike and extensive infrastructural damage, with access delays facing medical teams and service disruptions affecting water, electricity and internet networks. An unspecified number of houses were searched by Israeli forces and an unspecified number of residents were detained.

31 October 2024: The third floor of a medical facility was struck by an Israeli airstrike, destroying medical supplies and equipment delivered five days earlier from WHO. The dialysis department was put out of service and water tanks were damaged. Four medical staff were injured while manually extinguishing the fire due to the lack of resource
31 October 2024: Red Cross ambulances were denied entry into a camp to assist casualties by Israeli forces, despite coordination with them.
31 October 2024: A medical facility was hit by Israeli tanks, which opened fire on the building.
31 October 2024: Two houses inside a camp were hit by Israeli airstrike. At least 26 Palestinians, including four children, were killed, and 30 injured, including a health worker.
31 October 2024: A Red Cross ambulance crew performing first aid on a casualty was attacked and beaten by Israeli forces. Soldiers also delayed the ambulance to inspect the casualty’s ID.
01 November 2024: The gate of a medical facility was bombed by Israeli forces.
02 November 2024: A medical facility conducting the third phase of a children's polio campaign was struck and damaged by an Israeli drone, injuring six people, including four children.
02 November 2024: An ambulance crew was fired upon by Israeli drones while retrieving dead and injured people inside a camp.
02 November 2024: A health worker was killed when her family home was hit by Israeli airstrikes.

Between 03-12 November 2024: An NGO medical facility was forced to operate its generators only three hours per day, due to critical fuel shortages, disrupting life-saving surgeries and other health services.

03 November 2024: The third floor of a medical facility was hit by Israeli tank artillery, injuring six children, one critically. The paediatric ward, nursery, courtyard, medical supplies and water supplies were damaged.
04 November 2024: The personal vehicle of a UN aid worker working on the polio vaccination campaign came under fire by a suspected Israeli quadcopter while driving, damaging her car.
04 November 2024: A medical facility was hit by Israeli quadcopter drone strikes
04 November 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli airstrikes.
04 November 2024: A floor of a medical facility was damaged by Israeli forces airstrikes, damaging the solar panels and injuring an unspecified number of people.

05 November 2024: In a camp, near a medical facility an Israeli tank was hit with an IED by members Palestine Islamic Jihad (PIJ). Whilst members of the Al Aqsa Martyrs Brigade hit an Israeli tank with an anti-tank shell.
05 November 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was denied access to a sick patient by Israeli forces, despite multiple coordinations.
As reported on 05 November 2024: The delivery of medical supplies to an NGO medical facility was denied by Israeli forces, putting it at risk of closing.
05 November 2024: A Red Cross team evacuating casualties was delayed by Israeli forces.
05 November 2024: The direction of a medical facility was fired at by Israeli drones.
07 November 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by suspected Israeli airstrikes, killing nine people, including two children and four women and injuring an unspecified number.
07 November 2024: An unspecified number of health workers were injured when Israeli drones opened fire.
07 November 2024: Red Cross teams were blocked from reaching a person who had been shot by Israeli soldiers during a raid.
07 November 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli artillery shelling.
08 November 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli artillery shelling.

09 November 2024: A Red Cross ambulance transporting a critical patient was attacked and damaged by Israeli forces. The patient's companion was forcibly removed before being allowed to move to a medical facility.
09 November 2024: A tent sheltering displaced people in a medical facility's yard was bombed by Israeli forces, killing and injuring an unspecified number of people.
09 November 2024: An under-contruction INGO medical facility was taken over by Israeli forces and used as a base for its operations.
09 November 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli airstrikes, creating a fire belt around the facility.
10 November 2024: A medical facility reported that critical shortages of medical supplies and basic food, and ongoing Israeli blockades, are resulting in daily loss of life and severe malnutrition.
10 November 2024: In an undisclosed location, a INGO-led medical evacuation of child patients and companions to a different facility was blocked by Israeli authorities.
10 November 2024: The Red Cross were delayed at a checkpoint by Israeli forces, resulting in a patient's death.
11 November 2024: One person was injured when Israeli forces opened fire at the front of an NGO-supported medical facility located inside a refugee camp.
11 November 2024: A medical facility was hit by Israeli artillery, injuring three health workers.

11 November 2024: A UN-agency convoy aiming to deliver supplies to shelters and a medical facility was reduced due to delays in authorisation from Israel forces. In the end, supplies were not delivered to the medical facility.
12 November 2024: In a camp, an Israeli drone airstrike struck a group of people near a medical facility, killing six and injuring an unspecified number of others.
12 November 2024: In a camp, three children were killed in an Israeli airstrike that hit a house near a medical facility.
As reported on 12 November 2024: Access to an NGO  medical facility remained severely restricted.
As reported on 12 November 2024: Access to a  medical facility remained severely restricted.
12 November 2024: The vicinity of a volunteer health organization's medical facility was hit by an Israeli drone, killing six people.
As reported on 12 November 2024: Access to a medical facility remained severely restricted.
12 November 2024: Two doctors who were husband and wife were killed alongside their children when their home was struck by Israeli airstrikes.
12 November 2024: The vicinity of a UN-agency medical facility was hit, killing six people, including children, and injuring others.
12 November 2024: The yard of a medical facility was hit by Israeli quadcopter drones.
13 November 2024: The gate of a medical facility was hit by suspected Israeli forces at about 9:00, killing six Palestinians and injuring an unspecified number of others.
As reported on 15 November 2024: A UN agency's requests to access a medical facility were denied by Israeli authorities.
As reported on 15 November 2024: A UN agency's requests to access an NGO-ran medical facility were denied by Israeli authorities.
16 November 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli drone strikes.

17 November 2024: A Red Cross ambulance crew was prevented from providing first aid to a man who had been beaten by Israeli settlers and subsequently arrested by Israeli forces. The ambulance was then kicked by Israeli forced and forced to leave the area.

17 November 2024: An ambulance was prevented from treating an injured person by Israeli forces and police. The injured person was physically assaulted by Israeli settlers when their vehicle broke down on the road.

17 November 2024: In an undisclosed location, a humanitarian team was forced to offload food supplies intended for a medical facility at an Israeli checkpoint. Only some medical supplies were delivered to the facility.
17 November 2024: A house sheltering IDPs in the vicinity of medical facility was hit by Israeli forces, killing 15 people and injuring others.
18 November 2024: A medical facility was hit by Israeli forces, with shrapnel hitting health workers in the intensive care unit.
18 November 2024: A health worker was killed in his home alongside his family by Israeli airstrikes in the vicinity of the medical facility where he worked.
19 November 2024: A Red Cross crew were fired at, detained, and used as human shields by Israeli forces who forced them to strip the casualties and take their belongings. They were later released.
19 November 2024: A medical facility was hit by grenades dropped by quadcopters operated by Israeli forces.
19 November 2024: An unspecified number of health workers were detained from a medical facility and subjected to abuse, including being forcibly stripped, by Israeli forces.
19 November 2024: A medical facility's children’s dormitory was struck by Israeli forces, injuring an unspecified number of people.
As reported on 19 November 2024: The Red Cross were blocked from delivering food and water to an NGO-ran medical facility.

19 November 2024: A Red Cross medical team was temporarily detained and beaten inside a house while they attempted to provide aid and used as a human shield during an Israeli forces military assault on a camp.

20 November 2024: Two Red Cross teams were detained for two and a half hours and beaten by Israeli forces while responding to victims of a car shelling. Their ambulances were searched, and one damaged by rifles.
20 November 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli airstrikes.
20 November 2024: A health worker was killed in his home alongside his family by Israeli airstrikes.

20 November 2024: A medical INGO vehicle was almost hit by an Israeli drone strike while travelling from a medical facility. While the team survived, the attack killed 20 people and injured 10 others.
20 November 2024: A PCD team was directly hit while trying to rescue people under rubble, killing one staff member and injuring three others.
20 November 2024: A Red Cross ambulance vehicle was blocked and obstructed by Israeli forces during their ongoing military operation in the camp.
As reported on 20 November 2024: At least one Red Cross ambulance was seized by Israeli forces and crews were used as human shields during their ongoing military operation in the camp.
21 November 2024: In a camp, three women were killed and an unspecified number of civilians were injured when an Israeli airstrike struck the vicinity of a medical facility.
21 November 2024: Health workers were prevented from reaching a man who was shot and injured by Israeli forces. The injured man was subsequently arrested.
21 November 2024: A generator and oxygen station of a medical facility were struck by an Israeli drone, injuring four health workers and two patient companions. Oxygen supplies were fully depleted.
22 November 2024: An NGO-run medical facility in a camp was struck by Israeli quadcopters, injuring an unspecified number of health workers.
22 November 2024: A medical facility was hit by Israeli airstrikes, injuring 12 people, including at least five heath workers.

22 November 2024: An unspecified number of health workers were assaulted, a female health worker detained and their ambulance also searched by Israeli forces during their military operation in the area.
22 November 2024: A medical facility was hit for a second time by Israeli drone strikes.
22 November 2024: The perimeter of a medical facility was hit by Israeli unspecified explosives leading to a complete loss of electricity
23 November 2024: A health worker was injured when their office inside a medical facility was hit by an Israeli drone.
23 November 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli airstrikes.
23 November 2024: The vicinity of a Red Cross medical facility was hit by an Israeli airstrike, killing an unspecified number of people.
24 November 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by a booby-trapped Israeli robot.
24 November 2024: A medical facility was hit by an Israeli drone strike.
25 November 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli gunfire, killing two people and injuring an unspecified number of others.
25 November 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli artillery.
As reported on 27 November 2024: An LNGO medical facility was hit by Israeli bombardments, destroying equipment and burning medicines.
As reported on 27 November 2024: An LNGO food and medical storage facility was hit by Israeli bombardments.
27 November 2024: A medical facility was hit by Israeli shelling, killing three people.
28 November 2024: Medical teams were fired at by Israeli drones while attending a previous strike site.
28 November 2024: An NGO-run medical facility in a camp was struck by Israeli forces drones, injuring two health workers and two others.
28 November 2024: An NGO ambulance was hit by Israeli forces in a camp while evacuating injured people, injuring a health worker.
28 November 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli shelling.

As reported on 29 November 2024: Supplies at a medical facility in a camp were running out, forcing an NGO's teams to extend dressing change intervals, heightening infection risks. The NGO was unable to run certain operations due to restrictions and disruptions at borders.
29 November 2024: A health worker was killed after being shot by an Israeli drone at a medical facility.
As reported on 29 November 2024: An NGO makeshift medical facility reported a lack of medical supplies.
30 November 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli helicopter fire.
30 November 2024: A medical facility was hit by Israeli tank fire, injuring a doctor, destroying three electricity generators and damaging the third floor and water tanks.
30 November 2024: An NGO-supported medical facility was hit by an Israeli drone strike.

01 December 2024: Medical teams were prevented from reaching an area by Israeli forces, where Israeli forces killed four civilians during an operation that involved airstrikes and exchanges of fire between armed Palestinians and Israeli forces. The operation lasted about seven hours.
01 December 2024: A UN mission to a medical facility to deploy emergency teams and evacuate patients faced long delays by Israeli authorities.
02 December 2024: A UN-agency medical facility in a camp was destroyed by Israeli forces.
03 December 2024: Three health workers were injured when a medical facility was hit by Israeli quadcopter drones. The oxygen supply was cut off due to damage.
03 December 2024: An NGO-ran medical facility in a camp was struck by Israeli tank fire.
03 December 2024: An NGO-ran medical facility in a camp was struck by Israeli drones strikes
03 December 2024: A medical facility was raided by Israeli forces. A health worker was assaulted, five health workers arrested, a patient shot, and the emergency department was hit by heavy gunfire.

04 December 2024: An unspecified number of people, including a health worker, were killed or injured when a UN-agency education facility sheltering displaced people in a camp was hit by Israeli airstrikes, causing severe fires that destroyed over 15 tents.
04 December 2024: A Red Cross health worker was shot and killed by Israeli forces while returning from transporting patients.
04 December 2024: A medical facility was raided by Israeli forces disguised as medical staff. They stormed the ICU and assaulted the nurses, and arrested an injured patient.
Between 05-09 December: A fire broke out in the emergency department of a medical facility as a result of fighting between Palestinian forces and armed Palestinians in a camp.
05 December 2024: A medical facility hit by an Israeli airstrike, killing a child patient and injuring over 12 other patients and health workers.
05 December 2024: The third floor of a medical facility was hit by Israeli airstrikes, setting it on a fire.
Between 05-09 December: A patient was arrested from a medical facility in a camp, and subsequently released, by Palestinian forces.
06 December 2024: Red Cross ambulances were denied access to a refugee camp by Israeli forces, who killed a person with a gunfire during a raid.

06 December 2024: A medical facility was raided by Israeli forces who ordered all displaced people, patients and health workers to evacuate under artillery fire and airstrikes. A recently deployed emergency medical team was also evacuated. An unspecified number of people were detained and taken to a military checkpoint nearby. At least 33 people were killed, including at least four health workers. The IDF withdrew later that day.
06 December 2024: Three health workers were injured when Israeli forces fired at a medical facility and ambulances.
06 December 2024: An ambulance carrying a health worker was hit by Israeli forces machine-gun fire while evacuating people from a health facility.
07 December 2024: The Red Cross was denied access for about 30 minutes after Israeli forces shot and killed a person.

07 December 2024: A medical facility, including a neonatal unit, was damaged after being reportedly hit by over 100 Israeli missiles, shells and drone strikes. Water, oxygen, and fuel infrastructure in the facility was also damaged.
07 December 2024: Four health workers were injured at a medical facility by Israeli drone gunfire.
07 December 2024: A patient was arrested and an unspecified number of health workers assaulted when a medical facility was stormed by Israeli forces.
07 December 2024: A Palestinian Civil Defense staff was reportedly killed at the entrance of healthcare center.
07 December 2024: The Red Cross was denied access to a casualty for almost two hours by Israeli forces.
08 December 2024: Six health workers were injured when a medical facility was struck by Israeli drone strikes.
08 December 2024: A health worker was killed by Israeli airstrikes in the vicinity of an NGO medical facility in a camp.
08 December 2024: A health worker and his family were killed in their home by an Israeli airstrike.
08 December 2024: A medical facility was hit by an Israeli airstrike injuring a health worker and six patients, his wife and child.
08 December 2024: A health worker and his family were killed when their home near a medical facility was hit by an Israeli airstrike.
09 December 2024: A Red Cross ambulance crew was prevented by Israeli forces from reaching an area that had been shelled. The hood of the ambulance was beaten with rifles and they were turned away.
09 December 2024: Israeli forces have reportedly denied the entry of baby formula into Gaza Strip for three months.
09 December 2024: Ambulances were prevented from reaching two people killed by Israeli drones.
10 December 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli airstrikes.
10 December 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by an Israeli airstrike, killing at least 22 people inside a home.
10 December 2024: A health worker and his son were killed in their home by an Israeli airstrike.
11 December 2024: A medical facility was struck by shrapnel from Israel drones, damaging its water and oxygen system.
11 December 2024: Three people were killed by Israeli forces bombing at the entrance of a medical facility.
As reported on 11 December 2024: A medical facility in a camp halted some surgeries and procedures due to lack of supplies.
Between 11-14 December 2024: An NGO medical facility was affected by an Israeli evacuation order.
Between 11-14 December 2024: A medical facility was affected by an Israeli evacuation order.
Between 11-14 December 2024: A medical facility was affected by an Israeli evacuation order.
Between 11-14 December 2024: A medical facility was affected by an Israeli evacuation order.
Between 11-14 December 2024: A medical facility was affected by an Israeli evacuation order.
As reported on 11 December 2024: Medical and civil defense crews were unable to recover bodies of Palestinians in the streets due to Israeli threats to kill anyone attempting to approach them.
Between 11 and 12 December 2024: A home near a medical facility was bombed by an Israeli airstrike.
Between 11-14 December 2024: A medical facility was affected by an Israeli evacuation order.
11 December 2024: Ambulances were prevented from reaching injured people by Israeli forces.

11 December 2024: In a temporary shelter, over 30 Palestinians, including women and children, were killed when an Israeli airstrike hit a house, in the vicinity of a medical facility, which was sheltering displaced people.
12 December 2024: A health worker was killed after being shot in the head by an Israeli quadcopter on his way to work.
12 December 2024: A health worker was killed after being shot by an Israeli drone on his way to work.
12 December 2024: A health worker was injured when an ambulance was struck by an Israeli airstrike.
12 December 2024: A health worker and 30 Palestinians, including 12 children, were killed by an Israeli airstrike in a camp.
12 December 2024: A health worker, his child and 40 Palestinians were killed in a camp by an Israeli airstrike.
12 December 2024: Ambulance crews were prevented from reaching an injured person by Israeli forces.
12 December 2024: Medical crews and ambulances were blocked by Israeli forces from reaching injured people during a raid of the camp.

12 December 2024: A Red Cross ambulance on the way to a woman in labour was stopped by Israeli forces at a checkpoint. After further coordination, it was allowed to pass. Upon arrival, the woman had suffered heavy bleeding and lost one of the babies.
13 December 2024: A home near a medical facility was bombed by Israeli forces.
13 December 2024: An ambulance was set on fire by Israeli forces in front of the gate of a medical facility, days after shooting at and disabling the vehicle.
14 December 2024: A medical facility was fired at by Israeli tanks.
14 December 2024: A medical facility in a camp was stormed by Palestinian Security Forces who searched ambulances and deployed snipers around nearby buildings.
14 December 2024: A medical facility in a camp was surrounded by Palestinian Security Forces.

Between 15 and 16 December 2024: An unspecified number of ambulances were bombed by Israeli quadcopter drones, injuring three health workers and a patient, while evacuating patients from a medical facility.
15 December 2024: The gates of a medical facility were hit by Israeli drones, killing two people and injuring an unspecified number of others.
15 December 2024: A health worker, his wife and children were killed when their home was hit by an Israeli airstrike.
15 December 2024: A medical facility in a camp was destroyed after being bombed twice by Israeli forces, killing and injuring an unspecified number of people
15 December 2024: A civil emergency centre in a camp was hit by an Israeli airstrike, killing the head of the centre, 4 civil defense workers and a journalist.
15 December 2024: Access to a MSF clinic was restricted after Israeli forces installed a barbed wire barrier.
15 December 2024: In a temporary shelter, 20 people were killed and an unspecified number injured when an Israeli aircraft bombed the third floor of a school, sheltering IDPs near a medical facility.
16 December 2024: A medical facility was fired at by Israeli snipers, damaging all windows and forcing staff to treat patients in corridors.
16 December 2024: Red Cross paramedics were prevented by Israeli forces from entering a camp to evacuate an injured Palestinian who consequently died from their injuries.
16 December 2024: A Red Cross team on the way to live ammunition casualties was fired at by Israeli forces with preemptive bullets, denying them access.
17 December 2024: Electricity at a medical facility was cut off when the facility was hit by over 10 Israeli drones, damaging the generator.
17 December 2024: A medical facility's intensive care unit was fired at by Israeli forces, causing damage.
17 December 2024: A medical facility's oxygen systems and water and fuel tanks were struck by Israeli forces drones.
17 December 2024: A home sheltering IDPs in the vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli forces, killing eight Palestinians and injuring others.
As reported on 17 December 2024: A UN-agency was denied entry without reason to a medical facility by Israeli forces.
17 December 2024: A field medical facility suspended its services due to heavy fire in this area. Operations resumed the following day.

Around 17 December 2024: A UN-agency medical facility in a camp was taken over by Palestinian Security Forces during an operation. The agency was unable to access the facility until 23 December when it was vacated.

At the start of January 2025 , medicines were spoiled due to a power outage. The UN-agency offered medical services at a nearby facility.
18 December 2024: A medical facility was hit by Israeli forces tank and gunfire. The intensive care unit caught fire and was put out of service.
18 December 2024: A health worker was killed when his home was hit by Israeli airstrikes.
18 December 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli airstrikes, killing a health worker.
Between 18-23 December 2024: Five medical points suspended services after Israeli forces issued an evacuation order in the area.
18 December 2024: Health workers and patients were injured when a robot near an NGO-ran medical facility was struck by Israeli forces.
18 December 2024: A medical facility was hit for a second time by Israeli drone strikes which hit its gate.
19 December 2024: A home near a medical facility was bombed by Israeli forces airstrikes, injuring an unspecified number of Palestinians.
19 December 2024: A medical facility was denied medical supplies by Israeli forces.
19 December 2024: A Red Cross medical team was denied access to a camp and stopped from delivering medical services by Israeli forces.
19 December 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was fired at by Israeli forces while attending casualties in a camp.
20 December 2024: A medical facility was hit by Israeli shelling.
21 December 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli airstrikes, killing two Palestinians and injuring an unspecified number of others.
21 December 2024: A medical facility was ordered to evacuate by Israeli forces, hours after a UN mission had delivered fuel and supplies. As a result, contact was lost with the staff at the facility.

21 December 2024: A medical facility was besieged by snipers and its ICU and maternity units hit by Israeli airstrikes and tank fire, forcing staff to seek shelter in hallways. There was a severe shortage of medical supplies, equipment and food.
21 December 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was shelled by Israeli artillery.
21 December 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli bombing, killing a child.
21 December 2024: An NGO-ran medical facility in a camp was subjected to Israeli bombardment and gunfire.
21 December 2024: Medical assistance was obstructed from reaching a man who had been shot by Israeli forces near a medical facility.
22 December 2024: A medical facility's fuel tanks were struck by an Israeli forces airstrike, damaging the facility.
22 December 2024: A UN mission to deliver fuel and blood to a medical facility was delayed by Israeli forces who detained a patient and closed the checkpoint.
22 December 2024: A medical facility was damaged when Israeli forces detonated a bomb-laden robot near the facility,
23 December 2024: The roof of a medical facility was hit by Israeli drone strikes and other explosives.
23 December 2024: Five health workers were injured when the entrance of a medical facility was hit by an explosive in a box, planted by Israeli forces.
24 December 2024: An NGO-ran medical facility in a camp was damaged by Israeli artillery.
24 December 2024: A medical facility was hit by Israeli forces bombing.
24 December 2024: A medical facility was raided by Israeli forces.
24 December 2024: Patients and staff of a medical facility were forcefully evacuated after Israeli forces besieged the facility.
24 December 2024: Two Civil Defense staff and a fire truck driver were reportedly killed when a Civil Defense centre was hit by suspected Israeli forces.
25 December 2024: A health worker was injured by suspected shrapnel while working inside the camp.
25 December 2024: A Red Cross ambulance on the way to a casualty was searched by Israeli forces who commanded the crew to leave and not return after inspecting their phones.
26 December 2024: Five health workers were among 50 people killed by Israeli airstrikes near a medical facility. Israeli forces denied the attacks.
26 December 2024: The vicinity of an NGO-ran medical facility in a camp was hit by Israeli forces, killing five media workers.

27 December 2024: A medical facility was raided and forcefully evacuated by Israeli forces on claims that the facility was used by Hamas. More than 240 Palestinians, including health workers, were detained. Some were stripped, including the director of the facility who was beaten with batons and sticks, before being taken away to a suspected detention centre. On 02 January, a health worker died from his injuries caused during the raid.

As reported on 10 March 2025: UPDATE: The director of a medical facility has been detained by Israeli forces since 27 December 2024, enduring over 70 days of intensive interrogation, physical and psychological abuse—including beatings, starvation, and inhumane conditions at Ofer Prison. Despite this prolonged detention, no formal charges have been filed against him. He remains classified as an "illegal combatant," effectively stripped of his legal rights.
27 December 2024: A medical facility was taken over by Israeli forces and used as a military headquarters after expelling health workers and killing an unspecified number of people.
27 December 2024: An NGO-ran medical facility in a camp was directly hit by Israeli forces heavy gunfire.

27 December 2024: A medical facility was hit by Israeli airstrikes and live ammunition during its forced evacuation. A consequent fire destroyed key parts of the facility, rendering it out of service.
27 December 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was attacked and a crew member beaten by Israeli forces while taking cover in a camp.
29 December 2024: The vicinity of an NGO-ran medical facility in a camp was hit by Israeli artillery.
29 December 2024: The upper floor of an NGO-ran medical facility was hit by an Israeli strike, killing at least seven people, including three from an INGO, and injuring others.
30 December 2024: Four patients were detained by Israeli forces during their transfer between medical facilities by a UN-agency.
30 December 2024: The upper floor of an NGO-supported medical facility was hit and damaged by Israeli shelling.
31 December 2024: A UN-agency medical facility in a camp was damaged by a Palestinian forces rocket-propelled grenade.
